When you have a local (or remote) server running it is very easy to connect
  1. Create a new connection.
    var serverLocation = '127.0.0.1:4502'; 
var protocol = 'ws';
var controller = 'GenericText';
var ws = new XSockets.WebSocket(protocol + "://" + serverLocation + "/" + controller, XSockets.WEBSOCKET);
  2. Listen for the open event 
    ws.bind(XSockets.Events.open, function () {
    alert("You are XSockets connected!");
});
